thread.title: White House says hopes China changes trade practices to avert tariffs

title: White House says hopes China changes trade practices to avert tariffs
text:
White House says hopes China changes trade practices to avert tariffs   00:47 
The White House said on Wednesday it hoped China would change its ''unfair trade practices'' in a way that would avoid the need for the Trump administration to move forward with announced import tariffs.   
The White House said on Wednesday it hoped China would change its "unfair trade practices" in a way that would avoid the need for the Trump administration to move forward with announced import tariffs.  //reut.rs/2q6a8dO
